response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and the effort put into its development, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $8,500. I understand that every purchase is significant, so I assure you that this investment will pay off with its exceptional performance and durability. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this product to your esteemed use.", "product_price": 8500}
